title: _WDF_DEVICE_IO_BUFFER_RETRIEVAL (wudfddi_types.h)
description: The WDF_DEVICE_IO_BUFFER_RETRIEVAL enumeration is used to specify when UMDF makes an I/O request's buffers available to the driver.
